content: mushroom chapstick/lighter holder keychain for this pattern you should ideally be familiar with the magic_ring/magic_ring working in the round and single_crochet increase and invisible decrease you will need a 4 00 mm hook or a hook an appropriate size for your yarn 1 skein each of white and red yarn of your choosing i am using aran or worsted weight yarn needle stitch marker scissors and a keychain lobster clasp gauge is not important for this project
